weekly picks (Nov 3 week 2022)

Posted on November 14, 2022 in 2022nov,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2022 Nov 3rd week collection

  1. 2211.06468 Quantum correlations in the frustrated XY model on the honeycomb lattice (arXiv.org)

  2. 2211.06498 Ubiquity of light small pairs in Hubbard models with long range hoppings and interactions (arXiv.org)

  3. 2211.06811 Coupling of Magnetic Phases at Nickelate Interfaces (nickelate, arXiv.org)

  4. 2211.06817 Microscopic mechanism for intrinsic nonlinear Hall conductivity in noncollinear antiferromagnetic metals (arXiv.org)

  5. 2211.07007 A structural hysteresis in the charge density wave transition of 1T-TaS2 (arXiv.org)

  6. 2211.07010 Photoinduced sliding transition into a hidden phase in van der Waals materials (arXiv.org)

  7. 2211.07030 Field Tunable Magnetic Transitions of CsCo2(MoO4)2(OH): A Triangular Chain Structure with a Frustrated Geometry (Co Covalt, arXiv.org)

  8. 2211.07423 Revisiting superconductivity in the extended one-band Hubbard model: pairing via spin and charge fluctuations (arXiv.org)

  9. 2211.07370 Generalization of interlayer tunneling models to cuprate superconductors with charge density waves (arXiv.org)

  10. 2211.07406 Orbital Fulde-Ferrell pairing state in moir\‘e Ising superconductors (KTLaw, arXiv.org)

  11. PhysRevB.106.174411 Spin interaction and magnetism in cobaltate Kitaev candidate materials: An ab initio and model Hamiltonian approach (PRB)

  12. PhysRevB.106.174510 Testing for pair density wave order in ${\mathrm{La}}{1.875}{\mathrm{Ba}}{0.125}{\mathrm{CuO}}_{4}$ (PRB)

  13. PhysRevB.106.184206 Disordered graphene ribbons as topological multicritical systems (graphene, PRB)

  14. PhysRevB.106.195123 Low energy excitation spectrum of magic-angle semimetals (PRB)

  15. PhysRevB.106.195411 Topological characteristics of gap closing points in nonlinear Weyl semimetals (PRB)

  16. PhysRevB.106.195413 Kekule-induced valley birefringence and skew scattering in graphene (kekule, PRB)

  17. PhysRevB.106.205409 Spin-valley polarized transport in a field-controllable bilayer silicene superlattice (PRB)

  18. PhysRevB.106.L201403 Moire phonons and impact of electronic symmetry breaking in twisted trilayer graphene (Moire phonons, PRB)

  19. 2211.05870 3D two-electron double quantum dot: comparison between the behavior of some physical quantities under two different confinement potentials in the presence of a magnetic field (QD, arXiv)

  20. 2211.06006 Small-angle neutron scattering of long-wavelength magnetic modulations in reduced sample dimensions (MnSi, arXiv)

  21. 2211.06102 Multiferroic nitride perovskites with giant polarizations and large magnetic moments (arXiv)

  22. 2211.06156 Spontaneous antiferromagnetic skyrmion/antiskyrmion lattice and spiral spin liquid states in the frustrated triangular lattice (antiskyrmion, arXiv)

  23. 2211.06322 High-$T_c$ Superconductivity and Finite-Temperature Phase Diagram of the $t$-$t’$-$J$ Model (d-wave SC, arXiv)

  24. 2211.06185 Chiral Phonon Mediated High-Temperature Superconductivity (chiral phonon, arXiv)
